subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The results of the fan balloting for the All-Star Game will be announced Sunday night, with eight starters for the N.L. and nine (including the designated hitter) for the A.L.
snippet: The results of the fan balloting for the All-Star Game will be announced Sunday night, with eight starters for the N.L. and nine (including the designated hitter) for the A.L.
